snippet: The plans to renovate the flagship building of the New York Public Library are forward-thinking. But the essence of this cultural landmark should be preserved.
abstract: Editorial praises proposal to renovate the flagship building of the New York Public Library system; cautions library's overseers to take care that they preserve the essence of the cultural landmark.
lead_paragraph: The plans to renovate the flagship building of the New York Public Library are forward-thinking. But the essence of this cultural landmark should be preserved.
